help-file.title: HOMETOWN HOMETOWNS
help-file.content:
A "hometown" is a city of a particular race of Duris. There are numerous hometowns across the land, and you will start in your race's birth hometown when you enter the game. When you die, you will respawn in the city of your birth, unless you have paid to reset your home to another place (see help home).
Some of these Hometowns include:
-Tharnadia, the Birthplace of Humans -Charing, City of Elves
